item.title: WATCH: 3rd grader caught on camera saving choking student
item.description: Thomas Conley, 8, jumped into action when he noticed his classmate was choking in their school cafeteria.

item.title: Croatian police say a 7-year-old girl died, 6 people wounded in school knife attack
item.description: Authorities say a 7-year-old girl has died and a teacher and five other students were wounded in a knife attack at a school in the Croatian capital, Z...

item.title: 1 dead in 'brutal' Russian missile attack on Kyiv, US ambassador says
item.description: A Russian missile strike killed one person and wounded seven others early on Friday morning, Ukraine's Ministry of Defense said.

item.title: Government shutdown live updates: Trump calls for Congress to 'get rid of' ceiling
item.description: The federal government is set to run out of money Friday night.

item.title: 'Catastrophic event': What the US defaulting on its debt could mean
item.description: The reality is that a U.S. government default would be unprecedented, and many experts have said it would likely lead to economic chaos.
